parts.name: Drums
parts.notes: Driving punk rhythm. Accents on 'overflow' lines.

parts.name: Rhythm Guitar
parts.notes: Drop D. Palm-muted verses. Big chorus.

parts.name: Lead Guitar
parts.notes: High string bends and tension-building slides.

parts.name: Vocals
parts.notes: Angsty, urgent. Big shouts on post-chorus lines.
